The crowd went silent aside from a few giggles from the other college students. "C'mon! Tell us what you want for Xmas!"

You gulped down some more of the awful mixture that you were drenched in. "I... I want..." Your voice blared over the speakers as Brad recorded your frightened voice. "I want OUT OF HERE!!!", you screamed as loud as you could.

"Well, folks", Brad said over the karaoke machine. "Should Santa give her what she wants? Has she been a good girl this year?"

You could hear the other college students shouting. You could hear some chanting "YES!" while others were shouting "NO!". You couldn't believe your fate was in the hands of some drunk, horny young adults.

"Guess that settles it!", Brad said, though he gave no indication of what he meant. This was potentially your last chance to be free of this bully's gut. Will you get your Xmas wish?
1111132.title: Several Months Pass...

11111322.content:
"You heard them, little lady", Brad laughed. "You ain't going nowhere!" As the other college students laughed, your eyes welled up and you began to sob. Your only chance at seeing your friends and family again had been dashed by a room full of drunk, horny teens and young adults. Your prison was soon filled back up with foul-tasting beer and you were forced to down more of it until you began to feel woozy.

After the party, you had completely given up hope that you would leave. If no one bothered to save you before, they weren't planning on doing it now. This was your life now. Your entire world was confined to Brad's tight stomach. Your sustenance would be what he ate and drank. You began to grow used to the taste of the already chewed up food mixed with saliva. You would learn to scrunch up with him each time he did situps. Your mind would slowly begin to break, and eventually you would begin to grow fond of him. You would see the outside world as an awful place. Out there, you used to get sat on, transformed into lewd things and objects for other people's comfort. In here you were safe. You got fed every day, and Brad never abandoned you. Unlike... that one boy. You couldn't even remember his name now. Not that it mattered now. You were never going to see him again anyway.

During his workouts, you would begin to cheer Brad on as he lifted weights, helping him push himself past his limit.

Though eventually, he'd get tired of having to work around the little girl that lived in his stomach and he stopped exercising as often, gaining a good deal of weight. Soon enough, it'd be tough to even tell that he had someone in there with all of the weight he gained. He somehow still managed to take some girls home every now and then and they would have a laugh over your surprised yelps every time you were smushed under their combined weight.

He wouldn't stop eating, though. You would be constantly surrounded by food, some of it not even chewed up. Whenever you slept, it was always in a pool of stinking mush.

One day, he was sitting at home watching TV and drinking a beer, occasionally scratching his girl-filled gut before downing a plate of chips. "Th... thank you for dinner, Mister Brad...", you said weakly as you scooped up the chewed up nachos into your mouth.

"Glad you like it, gut girl", the college student chuckled as he chugged the rest of his beer. "Nice to see you finally settled in to your new home."

"Of... of course", you responded, your mind having long since been warped by your surroundings and the constant taunting. "This is where little girls belong... in the tummy of a big strong predator..."

"That's right, little lady", Brad laughed. "I bet if your little boyfriend heard you, he'd... huh. Y'know it's funny, I gulped you down to mess with him, but I forgot all about him. Heck, I haven't even seen him since then. Guess some other pred got to him, huh?"

"I don't have a boyfriend", you said. "I only have... you, Mister Brad. And that's all I need."

Brad laughed it off, but you were completely serious. As Brad got older, you would remain the same size and age in his gut. As Brad slept on his girl-filled belly, your dreams of knights and dragons were gone. Instead, you dreamed of being made into various dishes and being served to your big, strong predator. You sighed in your sleep as you had grown to love your new life in the bully's gut.
11111322.title: Permanent Resident [Bad End]

1111133.content:
You retched as the food around you began to digest, as well as your swimsuit. Brad sighed as he stood up and patted his girl-filled belly. "Think it's time to head home, little lady", your living prison chuckled.

You whimpered as you held onto your knees inside the belly, afraid of being potentially trapped inside this bully forever. As he walked to the apartment complex, you suddenly heard a familiar-sounding voice. "Yo, jockstrap!"

Brad looked back and chuckled. "Well well, looks like the shrimp brought a fat-ass gremlin with him... and that little burger boy!" You groaned as you realized who Jack had brought with him. He must have been desperate to have gotten Rico's help. He was almost as much of a bully as Brad, but at least he couldn't keep you inside of him forever... well, he could, but not in the same way.

"You... didn't tell me it was him you needed help with...", Ignacio muttered as he backed away.

"-tt- Don't worry about 'im, Iggy. This loser's not gonna be any trouble for me", Rico snapped before he looked back at Jack, who was cowering behind him and Ignacio. "Just remember, you owe me for this."

"Y-yeah, I got it", Jack stammered. He was scared of what Rico had planned for him, and Mary as well. But he didn't have much choice. Getting Trish to help would definitely end in disaster, the demons refused to mess up anyone else's fun or help a 'goodie-goodie', and your own mother was going to be unable to help, too. If he was more patient, he could possibly find someone else to help, but Jack wanted to save you as soon as possible. "Just help Mary!"

"Yeah, yeah, I got it", Rico sighed. "Look, jockstrap, I'm gonna give you a chance to give up this loser's little girlfriend before I show you the food chain around here."

You yelped as you suddenly bounced around inside Brad's gut while the jock laughed. "Haha! Already know it, shortstack! Big fish eats the little fish!"

"It ain't really that simple...", Ignacio said under his breath.

"Shut the FUCK up, burger boy! Or I'll smash the rest of your teeth in!", Brad yelled, causing the short punk boy to shrink in fear and grab at his mask.

Rico looked back at his boyfriend and suddenly got an angry look on his face. "What'd you just say?!"

"You heard me! Now why don't you and your little friends run on home or you're gonna be joining this little brat!", Brad laughed as he gave his gut a nice slap, making you yelp as his hand struck where your bottom was.

"Oh, you fucked up, jockstrap..." Rico scowled as he stomped over to Brad... and began to grow! With each step, the shortstacked teen's height increased until he was twice the size of the jock, and his clothes ripped off, leaving him completely nude! "...you fucked up big time..."

The formerly cocky musclehead gulped, falling on his rear and crawled away. "Wh-what the fuck!"

"It's like you said, loser! Big fish eats the little fish! Now stay there, little fishy..." Rico turned around and plopped down on the jock, smothering him in the vast, squishy brown assflesh! As the giant teen boy sat, you also felt yourself being compressed even more by his weight! Brad suddenly began struggling as the booty began to literally engulf him! Rico's flesh began to ooze over him like a sludge, pulling the jock into his already wide behind. "If you're gonna be an ass to my boyfriend, I might as well make you a permanent part of mine!" He looked over to Ignacio and smirked. "Bet you're looking forward to having a chance to pound him for a change, huh, Iggy?"

Ignacio's face was flush as he watched his boyfriend's booty begin to increase. "H-he, uh... he's not the one who bashed my teeth out..."

"Huh? But you-"

"I'm... I'm just real sensitive about them is all... and he keeps fucking with me about 'em..."

"Oh... well, you're gonna be pounding him and everyone else in my ass anyway once I'm done absorbing him..."

"R-Rico!", Jack screamed. "If you absorb him, you're going to absorb Mary, too!"

The shortstacked boi looked down and sighed. "Ugh, fine." Rico began to shrink back down to his normal size, though he now had a very large gut, which quickly began to bulge and wriggle around.

"Y-you better get me out of here, you fucking gremlin!", Brad yelled.

"Sorry, asshole. You're just gonna have to deal with the fact that you got gobbled up by a smaller fish", Rico chuckled as he slapped his gut. Inside the belly, Brad grunted as the corrosive gel began to dissolve him, making quick work of both the jock and you. You sighed in relief that your little Jackie's plan worked... even if you had now been eaten by two boys in one day. Everything soon went silent as you were reduced to nutrients and fat, further padding Rico's already impressive figure.

It would be several hours before you woke up, barely coming too as you heard the crashing of waves against the shore. When you opened your eyes, you saw that you were...
1111133.title: Always a Bigger Fish

choices: Lars forces his brother let you out.
11111332.content:
You let out a scream as you found that you were still in the same predicament you were in earlier. "I-I'm still in his stomach?!", you cried. "B-but you were digested! I should be out!"

You yelped as you suddenly felt a slap on your bottom as Brad smacked his belly. "Haha! Guess your little boyfriend's plan didn't work! Looks like you're sticking with me, little lady", he chuckled. You held your hands to your face and sobbed as Brad began to walk away, his prize still occupying his belly. He quickly went shopping for more clothes, as he was still naked. He would leave with a pair of shorts and a button-up shirt that he left open. "Heheh, gotta change up my wardrobe to accommodate for my little gut-filler."

"Be quiet, you jerk!", you yelled.

"Aww, is the little princess sad she won't see her boyfriend again? I can gobble him up if you wanna get another look at him", he laughed.

As he mocked you, you couldn't help but worry. "Poor Jackie...", you said to yourself. "Why didn't that thing work..."

Brad began to walk home as night fell. He headed up with his prisoner in tow, struggling a bit as he had to adjust himself to accommodate for your weight. When he entered his apartment, his fat brother, Lars, was sitting on a bean bag chair with his boss, Ignacio (who's voice you recognized from earlier). "Oh... guess the kid's plan didn't work...", you heard him say. There was something different about his voice, though. He sounded almost sleepy, and he was coughing a lot.

"You watch your mouth, you little gremlin", Brad snapped. "I'm still pissed at what your fat ass boyfriend did to me!" He began to stomp over to the short latino guy before Lars stood up.

"Hey, dude. Cut it out." Lars sounded very mellow, but you got the feeling that he had his limits. "That's what you get for picking on little kids." He then noticed the large gut that his brother was sporting.

Does Brad's chubby brother have it in him to help you?
11111332.title: Not Done Yet

choices: Head over to Aunt April's to play with Remy.
Go to the arcade with Jack.
Take Stevie to the beach. You promised...
112.content:
Your name is Andrew Morrison. You're an eight year old boy, and the best friend of Jack Harper... as well as his step-brother! It's been a few months since his mother married both your mom and her twin sister. Unfortunately, you haven't been able to enjoy your new family much. For some reason, the knowledge that your mother has always been a demoness hasn't done much to change your view of her. However, your aunts seem to get a kick out of messing with both you and Jack. While they just seem to make Jack uncomfortable, you've found yourself being transformed, squashed, eaten, and all kinds of other awful predicaments by the two of them. On top of that, your own mother has squished you on accident quite often, though lately she's been a bit less apologetic. You figure it's because she's around her sisters more often.

Even though Jack likes to spend more time with Mary or Ash, he's still your best friend, and you often hang out with him and your fox cousin, Remy. Even though he acts somewhat normal, Remy has a habit of occasionally pulling different pervy pranks on other students. He's sometimes made you an unwilling accomplice of some pranks pulled on his uptight sister, Janet, whom you normally find too much of a prude to want to be around, even if she is pretty.

Recently, you've had kind of a problem. Jack's little sister, Selena, has a cat named Ian, who's bite can turn other people squishy like Jack. For some reason, you seem to be his favorite target, and you've spent much of your time living in Spectrum Bay as a vulnerable squishie.

Unfortunately today isn't any different, as you're still recovering from being bitten just yesterday. You feel like you're close to returning to normal, but if you were to get squished, you might be in danger of being stuck in that state, unless you were to get bitten again or your mom or aunts were to help you out.

You've never been one to let a little bit of squishy-ness keep you from enjoying your day, though. You've still got things you want to do (or have to do) today.
112.title: Start of Andrew's Bad Day

choices: Stick to the plan, Remy has something in mind already it seems
Take April up on her offer (What could possibly go wrong)
before you decide you are interrupted by...
1121.content:
It took no time actually to get to Aprils house, Barbara seemed to want the house to 'herself' so she was gone almost as soon as you were out of the car. It wasn't exactly out of character for her but your mother usually would have at least said good bye if she didn't have something on her mind, well whatever it was you shouldn't bother with it since you were already here. You were about to ring the door bell when the front door swung wide on it's own catching your feet under it and flattening you out across the door mat rather than into the wall like you would have expected from a sudden door opening. A green foot found it's way onto your face, planting the fishy didget over most of your face so only one eye was looking up. The green skinned fish woman in a pink swimsuit still seemed slightly wet and you couldn't see her face passed her boobs she paused there on your face looking over her shoulder.

"Well, I'd say it was a pleasure doing business with you but I'd rather you didn't call so suddenly" She was talking to your Aunt you realize, even as the salty fishy taste was starting to drown your other senses out of focus, you'd hate to wonder what it was like under her for longer but thankfully it was only a mild painful shifting of weight as she walked over you and out. The silver fox Anthro that was your aunt April stepped onto you now but she had taken smaller steps landing her high heels onto your crotch with a light squish as she watched the fish woman go. You finally managed to form enough of a mouth to squeak out a yelp as she had started to grind her food on you in frustration just watching the fish woman leave.

"Oh Andrew, Barbie told me you were coming over, what are you doing flattened out here on the mat?" She lightened up but notably did not remove her foot until a few moments after when it was clear you couldn't really answer her smashed down as you were.

You coughed to get your voice back under control before answering now that she had peeled you up. "I'm supposed to hang out with Remy" April had a very... fox like look when you said that.

"Well Remy is playing at something in the far room down the hall, the one a couple doors down from Janet's room and the activity room. Although, Janet has a few friends over too, the Cheerleaders I believe minus Nikki and Brandy but... If you're waiting off Squishyness you could come and sit in with me, I've got a few more appointments but I'm sure we could have fun even then. I could use the distraction you know, it's rather stressful for me. ufufufu" That was a strange offer, April usually didn't want anyone sitting in on her meetings, let alone her own kids and you were sure that you hadn't been offered before... but you did come here with a plan and despite promising fun Meetings sounded kinda boring...
1121.title: Options at Aprils

choices: Go on in, it sounds fun
While your thinking someone sneaks up behind you
11211.content: You make your way down the hall at a leisurely place trying to avoid tripping over and falling into a squishy pancake on impact. The sound of your foxboy friend shouting got louder as you got closer to the room and from sound of it he was into an intense gaming session. This made you pause as you stood before the door. Remy wasn’t exactly mean but he could be pretty serious when it came to some of his games. In your current state it might not be the best idea to risk annoying him, but still that game does sound fun and you’ve certainly taken bigger risks before.
11211.title: Stick to the plan, Remy has something in mind a...

choices: Remy is too into his game and drags you around with his butt
Remy notices but is angry with you
112111.content:
Throwing caution to the wind you fling the door open and walk in. “Hey rem..” your greeting is cut off as your trip over a precariously placed cord. Moving dangerously close to a splat you barely manage to get your knee out in time so you end up kneeling rather than face first. Before you can get up you get a full view of Remy’s short covered butt as he shakes it back in forth. Looking up past the cheeks you see the reason for your current face full of booty. Remy is wearing a VR headset with motion controllers in each hand. The cords you tripped over see to be the result of him moving all over the room in his excitement and dragging them around.

“yeah take that you stupid monsters” Remy growled in his best grizzled hero impression as he swung his controllers back and forth like the weapons they represented. He seemed to be having a lot of fun and getting a bit of workout if the sweat on his fur was anything to go by.

Without any warning he leant back into what must have seemed a cool defensive stance in game but in reality, only served to slam your head into his ass. Remy’s butt wasn’t exactly a rose garden at the best of times but with the sweat and movement it was particularly rank and gross.
112111.title: Go on in, it sounds fun

choices: Remy continues sitting and plays a different game.
1121111.content:
Remy didn't seem to notice as your face was pressed into his furry butt, the plush cheeks wobbling underneath the fabric as he moved around. Your face turned red as the cord of his headset wrapped around you and he continued walking and jumping around. You tried to call out for him, but that only got you a mouthful of foxbutt as he shifted his hips and swung one of his rod-like controllers around. "RRRMMMMNNNN!!!"
As much as you called out, your words were muffled by his bottom and he was too engrossed in his game to notice. You had to try and hop on your knees each time he jumped, and move your head and torso around along with his movements. You didn't want to get squashed.

"Haha! Gonna have to try better than that, Zack! I'm number one in the region for a reason!" Remy seemed to be playing against one of your classmates, and his movements getting more intense. Finally he landed one final blow and you could faintly hear Zack groaning from your friend's headset as Remy panted. "Heh... better luck next time, buddy!", he chuckled before he finally turned his headset off.

"Finally", you thought. "He's gotta notice me now." ...only that wasn't the case. He kept his headset on and walked over to his game chair. It was one of those rocking bean-like chairs that other kids used when they played video games. Jack had one, too, but you could personally never understand why they had them. They weren't very comfortable to you, and you would rather just grab a couch cushion and sit on the floor. You weren't able to see past Remy's buttcheeks and his bushy tail before he took his headset off and sat down. You were finally free from the cord, but only just in time for Remy to press his big furry butt on top of you, squashing you and reducing you to a light flesh-colored pancake!

"Huh... this thing's a little comfier than usual", the fox boy said as he wriggled his hips. You groaned as your cousin shifted on top of you, wishing you could have done more to get his attention, like yank on his tail or something. "Hehe, I guess mom was right about me gaining weight!" Remy caught his breath as he continued sitting on his new cushion, and you were mentally screaming at him to lift his fat furry butt up.
1121111.title: A Fox's Seat

choices: Headmistress Anita Arachnia her old highschool friend (could talk for some time)
Slime Queen Giselle (who might take an interest in you while you're squishy)
Her mother Desiree (Demon Business, she's brought Camilla and Selena too)
11212.content:
"I dunno Aunt April I did kinda have plans..." The dejected look that she gave you made you feel bad, despite knowing April was a demon it didn't make you feel good to leave her disappointed. "But uh, I wouldn't mind if I could get something I want too." this was a line that your mother Barbara had taught you, she said it was a good way to either get her sisters to drop whatever it was they wanted from you or else make what they were offering much better. It was also a way to make you look strong or smart to any demon although April's response was a little more dramatic than you had considered. Her 'disguise' flashed away in a burst of flame, leaving the red skinned demon with silver hair that was your Aunt's true form in it's place.

"My my, how bold. In that case We'll play a game with... prizes. We'll play as many rounds as I care to, and each round the winner can make one request of the looser and the looser must obey as long as it is within their power. for example if you were to win and ask me to, just an example, grant you a demonic power, I would happily oblige." She smiled sweetly as if she hadn't just offered you a ticket to stop getting bullied so bad. You didn't even think about what she would do if she won before you grabbed her hand that she had extended to shake with you. The 'bad' feeling you got was when the hand shake felt like it was burning and you yelped and pulled your hand back, there was a symbol that you couldn't read on your palm now and when you looked up April was showing you the one on her palm. "The deal is struck." she said with a playful grin leaving you suddenly wondering if this wasn't a terrible mistake. "come with me to the office, we can start there."

Not seeing much of a point in trying to back out now you walked behind her into the office, which to your surprise was quite large with massive chairs and furnishings and even a bigger meeting table off to the side of the desk. You wondered what kind of game you were going to play, you could barely see over the desk as you saw April's tail flicking over it like she was looking for something. You pulled yourself up into the chair. when she stood up again she had a simple game, checkers which surprised you somewhat. "we can take turns deciding what to play, for now let's start with a light game. My next meeting is in one hour so we should be able to play at least two things before they show up." You watched her set up the board without saying anything, trying to figure out if you would be able to beat April at checkers, she was probably smarter than you but you were pretty good at it.

"can I go first?" you would have the advantage and April agreed to let you play red. The game was surprisingly over in just fifteen minutes and mostly because you had been over thinking your moves, from your perspective April was horrendously bad at checkers she was even worse than Bryan! You were excited as April leaned back into her chair 'defeted'

"I guess this match is yours Andrew..." she pouted as if she had been expecting to win with those terrible moves. Well either way this was your chance.

"C-can you give me one of those demon powers?" you were nervous because you didn't want to accidentally break some sort of rule but for some reason this made April sit up and smile. She walked around the table slowly almost as if she were making it seductive.

"Of course~ One Demonic power just for you" you looked at her hand and saw the mark glowing as she picked you up suddenly and kissed you on the forhead. A warm fuzzy feeling passed over you and stayed as she set you back down. She licked her lips "The other powers require a bit more... intense rituals, I'm sure you'd enjoy but this one was fast and I'd like to continue playing."

You were kind of confused as you were a bit tingly all over it was distracting. "What, what power? and why do I feel all weird"

April made a brushing motion with her hand "just a simple low level 'pleasure' power, it will make anyone you touch feel a nice comforting feeling or... a little more if you manage to make it stronger. As for the weird feeling, it's probably because you don't have the ability to turn the power off so you'll feel like that until you train a little. It's your turn to pick a game though." She was very dismissive of your concern, and this wasn't exactly what you meant when you had said you wanted a demonic power. Why couldn't she have given you something like Natalie ability to shrink people Selena totally would have gone strait to that if it had been asked of her. You would just need to try again, it wasn't like it was a bad power but at least you wanted something that would work for you better.

"let's play checkers again." you said knowing how bad she was at the game you were confident you could win against her if you played this game over and over. Unfortunately for you this must have been her plan all along because even a couple moves into checkers you could tell you were not playing against the same person who had gotten demolished last game, she had held back on purpose because she knew what you would ask for. Combined with the distracting tingling feeling it took the game twice as long to finish as you were over thinking every single move and April out played you instantly even then. You saw her collect your last peace as a feeling a dread washed over you. She made a show of casually counting the pieces and checking her watch.

"Oh darn, I guess I'll have to make this a quick request... my next meeting is in ten minutes that's not enough for another game before they get here." She tapped her chin as if she were thinking. "Andrew would you please lay yourself down in the big guest chair until my next meeting is over." she asked innocently "and no talking" You had been sitting in the massive chair since it was the one that had been near the desk, it was big enough for you to sleep on if you wanted. When you didn't immediately start moving the mark on your hand burned a little and you fell backwards and laying in the chair limply. You couldn't even feel the strength to move as April walked over and pulled your legs onto the chair as well and laid you across it. You wanted to ask her what she was doing but even if you moved your mouth no noise was coming out as the red cheeks descended on you to flatten you out. "Ohhh that power works nicely for you~ I hope my next visitor appreciates all your effort." she teased as she got off of your flattened body. Smiled as the door bell rang.. "Ah that must be my meeting, Don't worry Andrew, I'm not anywhere near board so we'll be continuing for some time unless something else comes up for you or me."

You could only watch silently as she left and then returned with...
11212.title: April's Demon Games

choices: She shoves you right in her mouth!
She makes sure you know your place first and foremost
She actually asks you what you'd like!?
112122.content:
You wanted to whimper for help, this was way worse than you thought. April sighed as she changed back into her disguise and walked out of sight. You weren't able to even move the chair to see who was coming in but whoever it was they were very quiet as you could only hear April's foot steps as she said some greeting or another and the figure came into view. Not that you recognized whoever this was by name other than the 'Giselle' that you heard from April just a moment ago, but her appearance would have frozen you gawking if you could have moved in the first place. The massive purple slime girl jiggled just standing still, her dark purple only broken up from what you could see by a honey colored pair of panties and a bright yellow bra. She was easily twice April's size, in both height and curves, you didn't quite catch her response before you realized that the huge bottom was coming towards you. You were surprised by the panties sprouting eyes and antennae as well as a mouth, it made a kiss face at you before the gelatinous mass crashed into you. The first thing you registered was the flavor, Honey with a hint of Grape as you were covered by the panties. The second thing was the pressure, despite being larger you had expected less of an impact from the pure jelly form of a slime, it was like she weighed dozens of times what she should even for her height. And even still it was impossibly soft, like a billion warm blankets laying on top of you, if you hadn't been squishy you feel like you would have just simply been swallowed by the softness probably literally.

Even under thousands of pounds of ass it was almost like her body conducted sound, it wasn't... too uncomforatable so you decided you might as well listen.

"-And that's why you need to stop trying to claim the park as a part of your Queendom. I've been very clear about this." April's voice finsished the part you hadn't been paying attention to.

There was a slight shift as Giselle crossed her legs. "I fail to see how that is my problem, it sounds more like their problem. If they wish to leave their offspring within distance of my resting grounds it is only natural that I should see that as an offering of a meal." The purple 'Queen?' said matter of factually.

You could tell even without seeing that a response like that was just going to make April gnash her teeth. "What I'm saying Giselle, is that I want you to stop encroaching towards the suburbs and I've got permission from the city council to offer you something in exchange for your cooperation."

You felt a focused shift as she leaned forward the weight sort of just rolled over you. "Well that is different, but really what sort of offer. I'm not interested in your 'money' you know."

"Well I just so happen to have something just for you prepared-" She started but a bubbly voice in your head drowned her out.

"Queen Giselle sorry to Bee a bother but maybe you could ask for this slime boy instead of whatever she's got?" The pun was emphasized but you didn't really understand why it was a pun. You could feel Giselle's mood shift somehow, almost like she had touched your brain as soon as she found out about you. She interrupted April who was still in the middle of explaining.

"Do not take me so lightly 'Mayor' your true bribery has been revealed to me. Or did you perhaps think that you could hide a Male from my watchful eye." She said smugly

April of course had no idea what she was talking about until the dots connected in her head, she slid the magic stone back into her desk drawer. "Of course not~" She purred as if she had planned this all along. "I did prepare him especially for you right there didn't I. I'm afraid I can't offer him to you fully though." She made a big show of being upset by it not that you could see. "Although if you promice to stop bothering the suberban moms I suppose you could have your way with him for a day... after that you'll have to convince him to stay." Wait what was happening now? Was April selling you off for the rest of the day just to deal with this uppity slime!?

"Oh, no true male slime could possibly even Think of leaving after they've gotten a taste." It kind of felt like she was licking her lips when she said that. "I think that's a deal Ms. Vulpis" She said shaking April's hand. You felt your inability to move lift even as the meteoric weight pressed you into the inability to move anyhow. You can't believe April had just sold you off to... okay you could believe that, she even made sure you weren't going to be stuck for longer than a day. Yep this was right up her alley if you really thought about it.

That being said the weight lifted off of you and you got to look at Giselle's face for the first time, it was pretty cute at least...
112122.title: Heavy is the crown

1121223.content:
"Now then subject, You will design the meeting of our date. Impress me and your reward will be great, disappoint me and... well do not disappoint me." She Declared you could already feel her hands dissolving your shirt as she said the word disappoint, you gulped a little not knowing what to do. She called it a date though, maybe that was a hint? Did she want to go to a date spot, you didn't know what a girl would be expecting from something like that but, you did have an idea maybe.

"I know just the place it's-" You lost your voice as she dropped you causing you to splat on the ground, only now that you could see her feet you saw one of them was covered in a thin bluish film like a sort of sock or sandal or something.

"Excellent, then we shall be on our way." She declared, without waiting for you to actually tell her what you were thinking her non 'socked' foot dropped onto you, but rather than the normal simple squash you expected instead it felt like your face stuck to the bottom of her foot and then your body folded in on itself forming something of a cushion over her whole foot. The world was exploded with purple, even the smell and taste the concentrated flavor of grape flowed over you as your body continued to twist over itself a couple of times as whatever force was pulling on you searched for something. It seemed to find it though as you felt a shiver of pleasure from something passing between her toes then wrapping back around into a 'sandal thong' only then did her full weight rest onto you again depressing the full cushioning you had been made into down to a paper thin film on the bottom of her foot. despite all of the pressure on you though, rather than overwhelming pain all you could feel was the pressure and a faint pleasant buzz The Grape was overwhelming it all though, you could barely think about anything else, especially when she started walking, the 'juice' practically oozed out of her. You thought you could hear Giselle talking but it was more like a whisper against the slapping of her feet on the ground, pounding you flatter and farther into grape land. At some point you had started feeling as if you couldn't tell what was even going on around you until you were ripped free of the foot.

Your cloths were gone now, probably dissolved by Giselle, but you were covered in a thick layer of 'sweat' that you were tempted to continue trying to lick off of you to taste just a little more but you blinked as you looked around, she had actually taken you to the place you had been thinking of! Could she read your mind or something?
1121223.title: Grape way to Travel

choices: You! (a video game? maybe you can beat them since they aren't familiar)
Zelenica (She goes with her favorite board game)
Desiree (Who goes with a Physical contest of some sort)
112123.content:
You couldn't even put up a mild struggle to get yourself in a better position, your muscles simply did not listen to you, even the usual feeling of attempting to reform wasn't working despite your mind being very actively trying to get your body to move. It was differnt from being unable to move from being smashed, that had some push back, this was just you relaxing too much to do anything. You could still look around so you focused on the door, the chair had been pulled out a bit so that April could smush you but it gave you a view of people entering which only let you know who would inevitably sit on you.

The first person to walk through the large double doors was April, her disguise had been put back up to answer the door and melted as soon as she walked into the room. The next person in was as surprising as she was dangerous, Desiree's human disguise melted as she passed the door as well, the massive Demon accidentally ripping her short shorts apart with her sudden shift. The Demon goddess was followed by two of her other daughters Camilla who looked somewhat annoyed and Selena or... Zelenica you supposed when she was in demon form that's what you were supposed to call her and she looked excited. "Mother, I understand you had some news to share... It was short notice but I got a nice seat for you while we have our meeting." She gestured to you laying flat in the seat, The black skinned demon glanced down at you and quirked her lips slightly.

"That's one of Barbara's boys, how opportunistic since your sister isn't here to protect him." She said running her finger over your body, it made you shiver even though it was warm. But maybe Aunt April would change her mind if your mom would be mad at her.

"Oh, don't worry about Barbie, even if she throws a fit he's agreed to a series of games so there's nothing she can say since he agreed." She grinned as she showed the symbol on her hand.

Meanwhile the purple skinned aunt had perched herself on an arm rest. "Ohhh, games? You really stepped in it this time huh puddin" She called you the nick name she liked using when you were squishy, based on your smell and taste. Camilla suddenly seemed much more interested in what was going on.

Selena had started searching for your hand and lifted it up to find your game mark. "I don't get it? Why is games so weird? I play games all the time and this doesn't happen." She seemed more interested in the game than your situation. dang it why couldn't that brat help you out for once, Jack was right about her.

Desiree scooted her out of the way, with her hand "Well I suppose this meeting is about teaching you more of Demon Culture so listen up Zelenica the first thing is-" and then the dark booty clad in golden leotard slammed into you completely muffling out every single bit of sound that was being made. The giant woman was by far the largest you had ever been sat on by, if April felt like a ton of bricks this was more like someone had dropped a mountain on you. You had definitely splattered quite a bit, spreading nowhere near the amount of her full ass but enough that you were touching skin instead of just parts of her leotard. She shifted a little every once in a while smearing you into the chair, there was a slight shift where she might have had someone in her lap but such a drop in the bucket barely changed how much her booty dominated your whole existence. If only you could hear what was going on maybe you could figure out how to get out of these games but you couldn't even tell who was talking through the pounds of booty.

There was a tiny bit of sweat that got to you from her bare skin but the vast majority must have been trapped in her leotard, that was probably a good thing, you'd hate to find out what that poor bit of 'spandex' went through daily. Then she was lifting up, your body had done nothing to save the poor cushion of the seat from loosing all it's springy cushioning. You heard the final words as she stood up "... and with that this meeting is over." and suddenly your body sprang back into your control, despite having been pulverized it was like all the energy you didn't get to use to struggle suddenly snapped you back into shape. You felt sore of course but surprisingly in once piece and not stuck to Desiree's booty. The Massive woman leaned down to talk to you for the first time since she arrived. "Well Andrew, you make a fine cushion, if you ever want a more permanent position I have a nice office chair..." She must have seen you make a face because all the color drained from yours when she said that. "I'm kidding, I'm kidding. You know how I can get when I don't have Dommie to toy with, his weekend in heaven is so hard for me you know" You didn't but you nodded because there was only so much contradicting you would do to the Hell Queen. "So it's only natural I'd be a bit playful, how about after the games are done I'll get everyone something nice deal?" She extended her index finger towards you, but you were concentrating on not saying or doing the wrong thing too much to notice her wording.

"Yeh sure G- Lady Desiree" You had almost called her Grandma, and that was NOT how Barbara had taught you to refer to her. You hastily tried to cover it up by shaking her finger but suddenly Selena's hand was squishing yours to the finger and then it was covered by Camilla's and then April's. You realized a second too late what was going on and your hand was trapped.

The four of them spoke in unison "The deal is struck, let the games begin!" You lost feeling in your legs as the 'fire' burned it's way into your body much stronger this time and a bunch of jumbled details collided in your mind. Flashes of rules and agreements that had been made while you were still stuck under Desiree, and the culprit behind the 'extended' participation was actually Selena. She wanted to practice with the family and since you were already there they decided that you could stand in for Barbra since she was busy. There were still no set rounds but the rules were different. Various games could have more than one winner and looser and in those cases winners would get a request from each looser, even in 'team' games. This had just gotten a whole lot more complicated and as soon as you could stand again you were sitting in a chair next to Selena and flanked by Camilla. Desiree took up most of the other side of the table but April could fit at the end.

Desiree spoke"So as we all agreed the game doesn't end until everyone has chosen the game the same number of times and the first person to choose a game will be..."
112123.title: Demonic Deals & Derrieres

1121231.content:
You were kind of suprised they weren't making you go last but you were still a little out of it, and that dang tingly power that April had given you was starting to get more distracting. You had to think of something none of them would be any good at so you could win and get them to leave you alone it was way to dangerous to continue for even one full round. The one thing you could think is how antiquated that they tended to be, sure Selena wasn't but she was still terrible at... video games! "tetris, we can play tetris in verses mode." there was a collective look of confusion around the table until Camilla snorted out a laugh and snapped her fingers.

a huge t.v. appeared on the wall and controllers in everyone's hands with tetris already loading onto the screen. "Tha' rules are simple, match blocks to give your 'pponents 'dead' blocks at the bottom of the screen, playas that hit the top lose." She explained seemingly reading the rules from the start screen. You might have worried about that but you had to focus on playing the game since everyone was default set to be 'attacking' you for some reason. You weren't some world renowned player but April, Desiree and Selena had never even played before clearly as they made fumbling mistakes and Desiree didn't even seem to be able to figure out how to rotate the blocks. Despite that you focused and beat April first, knocking her out after the second speed up, and then Selena by the fourth while Desiree practically beat herself without anyone interfering by the fifth. You were starting to get confident, but even as you deleted block after block Camilla seemed to be evenly matched with you. but then you looked over at her, she was only half paying attention! when you looked back at the screen she slammed down the maximum penalty bricks and you weren't fast enough. the elimination noise sounded and Camilla's tiny wings brought her to sit on the table while you continued to look at the screen even as it diteriorated into nothing.

The purple skinned demoness had a grin as she looked down at you. "Thought 'ch were pretty clever huh puddin' that's whatcha get for underestimaten' a demon. Now lick my feet looser." You felt the mark burn and your arm reached out before you could stop it to yank the boots off of her and notice that she didn't have socks before your face moved forward tongue out and started licking the salty sweat off of her foot like ice-cream that was melting too fast. Your eyes watered from the smell and taste but even putting your hands on her calf trying to yank your body away did nothing. "and don't miss between the toes" she said casually before turning her attention away from you.

"April, I'm getting a new sound system in my room, order it with your card." You saw April curse under her breath and pull out her phone, you get the feeling Camilla had been bugging her about that for some time. "Zel... hmmm Gimme a third of your candy stash." the younger demon made like she was going to say no at first but then you heard her yelp like she had been bitten by a dog and Camilla was holding a bag of what might be gumballs or jawbreakers. "Calm down squirt, I only took a third. You're hordin' 'em anyway." The bag she had was one of those three pound candy bags, that was only a third of what Selena had! You don't know why Camilla wanted the candy so much but it seemed like a lot. You had cleaned all the sweat from the first foot and had forcibly moved to the second, leaving only the banana scent in your wake. "and Mom... ah let me get a shopping card, I want enough for a full outfit from Hell. The top end stuff from Deavolo's shops" Desiree conjured a card from flames and handed it to Camilla.

"Don't get too greedy, daughter you know how competitive these things get when you take too much." Desiree seemed to be warning Camilla but it seemed like the comment was directed at Selena. You regained control of you body only to half and cough and Camilla to squeeze your tongue between her toes before you could get away. She wiggled her toes and laced the your tongue through the gaps before pulling away really fast and making it roll up like a cartoon. You were having a hard time getting the taste out of your mouth.

"You know you're really good at that~ loose to me again and I might need you to comfort me more puddin' you're even better than usual" She kicked the shoes too the side and decided to put her feet in your lap instead of sitting in her chair right. You would have complained... if you could feel your tongue. Camilla meanwhile tossed some of the small candies in her mouth and you tried to focus on who was next...
1121231.title: Beaten at your own game

11212311.content:
Selena seemed absolutely livid that Camilla had taken her candy and it was apparently her turn to choose the game. You were not prepared for what she said though. "We'll play brick by brick. You all know but I'll explain the rules for Andrew. The game lasts until one team gives up, the team members sit on the biggest team members lap and add weight until someone gives up. Since there are five of us but Mommy is so big Mommy and April and Camilla can be on a team and I'll be a team with Andrew." This game sounded like you'd have a huge disadvantage, it didn't make sense why she would choose to have you as a partner, but you couldn't complain. "Don't worry since this is a Hell game the mark will be reading to see when you give up even if you can't talk. Mommy can you drop the blocks, twenty second intervals should be fine."

Camilla and April looked at each other. "Uh Zelencia that's not a game it's-" "Are you tryin to torture us you runt!! I Aughta-" The two of them shut up as Desiree clapped loudly.

"The mark has already excepted it as a game. If you two would like to forfit instead I don't mind taking a loss here." She said calmly and they looked at each other again and shook their heads. "good then each of you get a thigh... oh we'll sit on the floor, these chairs will absolutely break before we're done. Zelencia you're shorter so you sit in his lap."

You felt the chair fly out from under you and Selena jump right into your lap and wiggle to get comfortable. "Ohhh that's a good idea, here I'll share with you so you don't ruin this for me" You wanted to question what she meant but you were overwhelmed by a sudden sensation of pleasantness, the weight of her not quite crushing your lap didn't bother you anymore. "Ohh this is gonna be so good." she squirmed as you got into the same position Desiree had with your legs folded under your knee. "Ready! Start" As soon as she said it there was a finger snap and a stone brick at least twice your size started falling from the ceiling, you almost panicked but it was too late. You and Selena were splattered to goop instantly. You expected the pain to overwhelm you immediately but instead you felt... excited, pleasurable? euphoric? Wait when Selena said she would share... another weight slammed into you and you felt the moan from the splattered form on top of you and had to resist the urge to moan yourself. The second strike had been a hit of ecstasy along with a skull splitting spike of pain. You tried to make sense of it but every time you collected your thoughts another strike rained onto you until you were only groaning along with her in time with the strikes. You were waiting for the next strike, anticipating it when suddenly the weight was gone. You were still blind as Selena was on top of you but you could tell the game was over. did you win? did you lose? no you hadn't given up it was clearly the other team that had given up. Selena was too much of a masochist to ever have lost this, if her sharing her feelings with you was any indication. Of course she was the first one to reform and you were left stuck to her somehow all rolled up onto her butt as she sat back in her chair with a light squelch barely noticing you hadn't gotten off on your own.

"Let's see, let's see. You were so mean earlier Sissy Cammi it makes me want to get more out of you. Ohhh I know, I want that Soul Drink you've been saving. I never had one..." Camilla's eyes bulged as her face turned sour and a can not unlike a soda can whirled into the room and she tossed it over to Selena.

"Warning squirt, that stuff is way too strong for you, you ain't ready heck Barbie can barely handle her drinks." Camilla warned but Selena was already opening it and chugging so that Camilla couldn't take it back later. You tried to contact Selena but suddenly felt yourself heating up, why did it suddenly feel much better under her cute butt. wait why did you think that? She hadn't cut off the connection yet and you were getting a bit light headed from whatever she was drinking.

"WOW, that's sooooo good. it's like a super soda! Mommy I want more can I have more for later please please please." Desiree stopped herself from chuckling and reached into a black portal pulling out a six pack of the cans with different colors. "these are yours, AFTER the game young lady, if you drink them all now you'll get sick." Camilla was nearly floored by how many Desiree had just causally happened to have with her. "Aaaapril, I wanna club houuuse for my friends. leemy have a spooot." April sighed and took out her phone again.

Suddenly she seemed to remember you were on her team and shifted on top of you "Aaandrew what are you doing down there." She whined yanking you out from under her. "you gotta get your stuff too." she said.

You were going mad though, Selena still hadn't cancelled her spell if she even could and everything was turning pink. When you finally spoke up you had been staring at April's slightly exposed clevage for a few minutes. "Well? What are you gonna ask this time Andrew." you could only sputter stupidly, but the only one that seemed to catch on to what had happened was Camilla she wasn't about to say anything until you were done though.

You continued staring and somewhat by accident you just said "Boobs" and your head bobbed up and down fixated on the jiggle. When asked if you just wanted to press your face in them by Camilla you continued bobbing your head until April grabbed you and shoved your whole head in her cleavage. They were so soft, you just went limp and let it happen as you were dragged over and the same was done by Camilla and then when you were deposited in Desiree's. Suddenly the connection cut off and you felt constricted as you slowly sank farther into the ebony cleavage. You were actually amazed by how much give that Desiree's boobs had, they were so soft that you weren't even flattened out by them you were just slowly slipping farther in aided by a massive amount of sweat you tried to say something but your head went under just then and then the giantess brought her hands up and smashed them together even harder flattening you out on the inside and rolling you around until you had picked up all of the sweat. only then did she set you back outside and let you reform.

"I must say you're doing remarkably well at these games, and at... other things. Maybe you would make a good sweat rag too, you seemed to enjoy that quite a bit." She laughed as you shook your head and backed up into your chair. Selena was... not content to sit alone anymore jumping into your lap and hanging off of you, you were kind of afraid of how she was acting.

The next game was starting and the one choosing it was...
11212311.title: Zelencia(Selena) Masochist Game

choices: Barbra's Game!!! (This is the something else chapter)
112123111.content:
"Next up we'll play a very simple game, everyone write a word on a piece of paper and give it to the person sitting next to you without letting them see it. Then we'll start talking, anyone who says the word that they were given looses." She clapped her hands together happily as paper and pens appeared on the table. Selena reluctantly let go of you and stopped trying to eat your ear to get her paper. You looked to your left, Camilla would be the one you were writing for, how could you make sure she got eliminated was there anything she said often enough that it would come up in conversation no matter what? Then the idea struck you, she'd been calling you by that dumb nick name this whole time so you wrote that on the paper surely she couldn't resist taunting you for the whole game. Everyone else had made their choices as well it seemed, hopefully Camilla knew what Desiree would say well enough to eliminate her too. You couldn't read your own of course but you knew what everyone else needed to say, 'Puddin' for Camilla, 'No Fair' for Selena, 'Only ones left' for April and 'Soul' for Desiree.

You looked around after nobody had started talking, April cleared her throat "I forgot to mention, if thirty seconds pass and you haven't said anything you also loose." Selena jumped up immediately surprised.

"No fair! you didn't say that before we started" She accused and felt the paper in her hands burn up denoting that she had lost. "Huh? Huh? what happened?" She looked at the ashes confused.

"That was the word you weren't allowed to say Selena" You answered her quietly.

"He's quite right daughter, you appear to have been eliminated." Desiree sighed

"Hah, even little puddin beat you without help this round" Camilla laughed and felt her own paper burn causing her to stop in a cough.

"And that was yours dear sister, it seems our nefew had you pegged from the start." She covered her mouth to prevent herself from laughing at Camilla too much.

Camilla looked at you with a slightly more burning fury than you were used to, what was she so mad at you for! it wasn't your fault she was so predictable. She rolled her eyes and scooted her chair closer, and so did Selena. "Not against the rules to keep on talkin if you're elminated is it?" She asked, and you got nervous as the two demons closed in towards you.

"Bu-but you can't stop me from being able to talk that would be against the rules!" You nervously said as they each grabbed one of your hands you no longer had the option of trying to run. "What are you doing! Let go" You were a little panicked as April didn't agree to your 'addendum'

"Relax puddin, I'm just feeling a little hunger since I got some time after being eliminated. Lemmy chomp on your arm a bit." You were about to refuse when Selena stuffed your hand in her mouth and started chomping away and you yelped instead. Taking that as her cue Camilla did the same. "Aunt april do something." you whined as the two of them had started chomping their way up your arm treating you like gum. but she was practically ignoring you in favor of a present conversation with Desiree in which neither of them have said their phrase.

"yehhh shooo yummmmy" Selena didn't even seem to be in her right mind and Camilla was just matching her pace up your arm. Thankfully it was nowhere near as painful as a full body squash but their slimy mouths and rhythmic chewing were a bother. You were trying to think of things to say still but they had nearly reached your shoulder.

"What's the weather like in-" You were cut off as selena had reached the end of your arm and just shoved your whole head in her mouth, licking you all over and compressing your head down to a manageable size for her to chew when the pressure doubled. Even though you were already in Selena's mouth, it seems like Camilla had just shoved both of you into hers and sucked the rest of your bodies in mashing you together like two sticks of gum. The strawberry-esq flavor mixed with saliva and got into your mouth, it was like strawberry syrup but you were having a hard time keeping yourself separate, the teeth mashed and mixed you filing your senses with Strawberry Banana until suddenly you were spit out.

"Game's over... Mom won as soon as you got eliminated." You lay there in a lighter pink blob more like Selena's normal looks than her hot pink demon form. You tried to move and felt a giggle from Selena.

"Zelencia regain your senses" Desiree commanded and suddenly you felt a ripping sensation and a wild rapid shift until you realize Selena had completely reformed but you were still mashed up and sitting on her tongue. She rolled her tongue back and brought you back into her mouth absently chewing on you.

"That was weird? Tasty though." She said mashing you until some 'juice' came out and then blowing a bubble. As soon as you were nearly as big as she was she snapped her fingers and you were fully reformed. You blinked and looked at her wondering what that was all about.

Desiree was the one that answered. "If Zelencia hadn't pulled you apart herself you would likely have been permanently fused onto her somewhere. As thanks for my... help you will now know and voice your desires until the magic of our contract fades." You felt the burn in your hand as the magic took effect but... was that really a punishment?

"T-thankyou" You weren't sure that you had wanted to thank her but as soon as the thought had passed your brain it had come out of your mouth.

"Camilla, I believe you have paperwork to file. You'll be doing that after these games are over. April, I have some souls that have reached assertion, you'll be in charge of the meeting regarding this." Desiree seemed to have had some actual work in mind for her daughters as well, who knew.

The games had two more rounds, hopefully you could get through them unharmed.
112123111.title: Words with Fiends

1121231111.content:
Camilla's turn, that meant Desiree was going last and you could only guess that her game would be the hardest. The purple demon hummed for a second as if she was considering her options. "Dance Dance Revolution." She said snapping her fingers the dance pad appeared one large enough for Desiree to play as well. "Taking turns, we'll do this elimination style Two players go head to head, looser added to the looser until only one remains." That was deceptively simple, and you were okay at games like this, not like Camilla had a significant height advantage. In fact if April was any good at video games she'd be the one to watch out for. "Puddin you're up first, and verses... Mom you wanna give it a go?" Okay so she wasn't making it easy, Desiree made the machine groan when she stepped onto it. You couldn't reach the screen so Desiree got to choose the song. You got ready to go since the song she chose was rather easy, you got exactly one step off before you were thrown completely off balance by the practical earthquake that Desiree dancing caused. You were tossed into the air and fell back down and then again, and a third time you splattered out on the left arrow right before the looser screen played.

Desiree had not been expecting to win but she was excited all the same as she smiled down at you. You were about to try and reform and get up when Camilla's still bare foot landed on you. "My turn next. Let's go" She Started the song, a hard mode song even and flung herself around on the buttons slamming her boot into you over and over seemingly not bothered by the massive earthquake Desiree caused flailing about on the dance pad. "Perfect Game!" Camilla wiped the sweat off her forehead as Desiree feigned disappointment and went to sit back down. Camilla it seemed did not have any plans to let you go rest while the game was going on as she steamrolled both of her sisters. The match was over and it seemed like this time the one to choose had easily won.

"Alright I think this time I want to make... secret requests." She said peeling you off the dance pad. "Starting with Puddin' here, bee are bee" She said stepping into a side room. "Alright Puddin' you really got me last time huh? Lemmy show ya what a real gotcha is like. Reverse Desiree's command, Once you think of what you want you say the opposite, or just say what you don't want the most I don't care which." She smiled having given you your command and tossing you out of the room. "Next!" She shouted as you fluttered onto the table.

You groaned as Selena leaned over you. "What did she tell you to do?" She asked but you felt even though you could talk you couldn't tell her for some reason.

"Nothing much." You ended up saying and she took that to mean you didn't want to talk about it leaving you alone to actually reform. You had to win this last game, whatever it was you didn't want to know what would happen to you if you lost you had to ask for them to leave you alone, at least for the rest of the day since you missed your chance because of Selena last time.

It was Desiree's turn to choose a game...
1121231111.title: Camilla Dancin'

choices: Desiree has some buissness to get to
Desiree has a friend to meet up with
Desiree doesn't have you very long before Barbra catches wind, can she save you?
11212311111.content:
After everyone had met in the side room with Camilla you were all once again sitting at the table as Desiree pondered what game she wanted to play. "Oh I know, Let's play Demon's Dice. It's been so long since the lords of hell have been able to arrange a get together, I'd hate to get rusty." She said as if she hadn't just dropped that this was the kind of party game she would play with other demon lords. How were you supposed to win even? "It's perfectly simple, nothing too complicated for new players." She explained as cups full of five dice appeared in front of each of you. "It's like Liar's dice but each round the players will sacrifice one of their dice to the random dice pool in the middle. Once all the rolling is done we'll guess how many of a particular kind of dice there area, you can't go down in number or how many that you think there are and we continue to go up until someone calls bluff. The player that is wrong is eliminated from the game." You gulped, this was impossible wasn't it, you weren't a great liar and figuring out if any of your demon family was faking knowledge would be not worth it. You resolved to just try and play as strait as possible... the only problem was that by your first Anti you realized you couldn't say a single thing the way you wanted.

That was actually where the bad news ended for you in regards to the game, Apparently the command Camilla had given you had made you nonsensically good at bluffing and before you even realized what was happening you were the only one left against Desiree who seemed... confused? It was hard to tell what was on her mind but it seemed like she didn't understand how you had managed to make it past the first round. You of course figured that it wasn't possible for her to loose now that it was just the two of you and you wanted to surrender now but you couldn't say it thanks to Camilla. You slapped the dice down one more time and peeked under... your pool was all sixes, that was either impossibly good luck or bad luck. Desiree looked satisfied with her roll as well. "Three sixes." She declared, seemingly trying to corner you directly off of the bat, you knew there were more so all you had to do was go for no more than the number you had and...

"Nine Sixes" You blurted out before you could stop yourself eyes going wide as you realized how ridiculous that would be, there were only ten dice left and each of you only could see four of them. Desiree seemed to realize as well and gave an amused look.

"You aren't giving me many choices... I suppose I'll call that a bluff." She said casually lifting her dice to reveal three sixes and a one, and then your dice to show four sixes, and finally the hidden dice... they were both sixes. Desiree opened her mouth to speak and then closed it again clearly shocked. "You, win?" She almost seemed to be asking a question. "I see I see, very interesting~ I suppose this will be the last round, go claim your prizes." She wasn't exactly smiling anymore, more like a neutral expression of someone that had not gotten their expected outcome.

Yes, yes, yes now you could finally Tell Camilla to leave you alone. You walked up to her and opened your mouth "Aunt Camilla, can you-" you felt something weird in your throat "Greet me with that cute booty bump every time we see each other, the one where you land on me." Your eyes bulged at the words that ended up coming out. You HATED when she greeted you like that, why? oh... this was going to be bad. Camilla laughed

info.brief_description: Pick a citizen and try and make it through the day without incident.
info.description:
Spectrum Bay is a city full of various kinds of people, each more predatory than the last. Vore is commonplace, and there are several residents who's bodies are squishy and malleable (and rather tasty). Just because they're vulnerable, though, doesn't mean they're at the bottom of the food chain. With enough practice, anyone can be a predator... sometimes someone will simply shove themselves right up your booty!

There's more than just vore going on, though. If you aren't careful, you could be turned into a squishie, or even end up in someone's underwear drawer!

In a city full of different species of predators, it can be difficult to make it through the day without something going wrong.

A list of characters within the world of Spectrum Bay. You don't necessarily have to use someone from here.
https://sta.sh/21sw92n3ol6t

I've written numerous stories and made several comics with the city's residents.
The stories are here:
https://aryion.com/g4/view/483535
And the comics can be found here:
https://aryion.com/g4/view/626666

=====================================================================================================

Rules

1) Death isn't permanent. While some characters can be digested or smashed, they will walk out of the ocean and onto the beach once the sun sets as if nothing happened... though they'll walk out without their clothes.

2) You can switch to another character at any time. Just try to have the switch make sense.

3) Some characters are meant to only interact with certain characters. Please respect that.

4) Try to use proper grammar and punctuation.

5) Please keep chapter at a decent length. No one-sentence chapters. Bridge chapters are understandable, but try to limit them.

6) If you'd like, you can introduce your own character in the "new student" or "tourist" choices.

7) Just about anything is allowed. Magic/transformation/aliens/ect.
The only thing I won't allow is excessive gore and scat.
